title: Annual report
context: ยง674-14 Annual report. The panel shall prepare a report to be transmitted to the governor and to the legislature, at least twenty days prior to the convening of the regular session of 1998, and a final report to be transmitted to the governor and to the legislature, at least twenty days prior to the convening of the regular session of 1999, which summarizes its activities in furtherance of this chapter, and shall include a summary of each claim brought before the panel, the panel&rsquo;s findings and advisory opinion regarding the merits of each claim, and an estimate of the probable compensation or recommended corrective action by the State, for action by the legislature in regular session. [L 1991, c 323, pt of ยง1; am L 1993, c 351, ยง9; am L 1997, c 382, ยง5]
